title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 575.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 575.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) These
regulations apply to a local governmental unit which elects to participate in
the community support services program. (b) These regulations apply to a provider of
services which has contracted with a local governmental unit to provide a
community support service. (c) These regulations apply to any provider of services which has a direct contract
with the Office of Mental Health to provide a community support
service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
575.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
